definition: to be jealous of/to envy/jealousy/envy
to be jealous of/fear/dread/scruple/to avoid or abstain from/to quit/to give up sth
to envy (success, talent)/jealous
variant of 妒[du4]

sentences.english: Her sister is Very abundance jealous.
Everyone can be very venomous, if you taste what is the jealousness .
sentences.chinese: 任何人都可以变得狠毒，只要你尝试过什么叫忌妒。

sentences.english: Envy is a waste of time. You already have all you need.
sentences.chinese: 忌妒是在浪费时间，你已经拥有你所需要的了。

sentences.english: Nothing but death can reconcile envy to virtue .
sentences.chinese: 别无他物，只有死亡能使忌妒和德行重新言好。

sentences.english: Our envy of others devours us most of all.
sentences.chinese: 我们忌妒他人将我们大部分吞没。

sentences.english: Please try and have a jealousy free living!
sentences.chinese: 请你尝试着释放掉忌妒心去生活吧。

sentences.english: They only say such unkind things about you out of envy.
sentences.chinese: 他们纯粹出于忌妒才说你这些坏话。

sentences.english: He did so out of envy .
Don't belittle her piano playing just because you're jealous.
sentences.chinese: 不要仅仅因为你忌妒而贬低她的钢琴弹奏。

sentences.english: When John's brother got a new bike, John was green-eyed.
sentences.chinese: 约翰忌妒哥哥买了一辆新自行车。

sentences.english: Jealousy was assigned as motive for the crime.
sentences.chinese: 把这一犯罪行为的动机归因于忌妒。

sentences.english: Love looks with telescopes; envy with microscope.
sentences.chinese: 爱情大处着眼，忌妒吹毛求疵。

sentences.english: If so, what differentiates between love and jealousy?
sentences.chinese: 若是如此，那爱与忌妒有何不同？

definition: to be jealous of (sb's achievements etc)/to be envious/envy
to be jealous of (sb's achievements etc)/to be envious/envy
to be jealous/to envy/to hate
to hate out of jealousy/to resent
hate (due to envy etc)
to resent/to harbor a grudge against/to loathe/resentment/rancor
to detest/hatred
to hate/to detest
jealousy/to be jealous of
variant of 憤恨|愤恨[fen4 hen4]
to feel hatred/to harbor a grudge
to view sb as an enemy/to be hateful towards
resentment/grudge
to be suspicious and jealous of
to hate and resent/angry and full of grievances
to hate/hatred/to resent/embittered
